epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Management
epics.summary: Enable secure enterprise authentication, role-based access, and tenant isolation
epics.description: Implement enterprise authentication integrated with identity providers via SAML, OAuth2.0, or OpenID Connect to support single sign-on (SSO). Incorporate role-based access control (RBAC) that defines different user permissions based on organizational roles. Ensure tenant isolation by implementing user segmentation at the data and application level to protect against cross-tenant access. Include multi-factor authentication (MFA) and session management for secure user operations in compliance with enterprise policies.

epics.title: Multi-Cloud Account Onboarding and Integration Engine
epics.summary: Enable secure onboarding of accounts and integrations across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud
epics.description: Create workflows to securely onboard and manage multi-cloud accounts. Implement provider-specific integrations with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud APIs using permission-controlled access and credential encryption. Validate connections, manage tokens, and monitor API connectivity health. Support automated reauthorization workflows and audit onboarding activities for traceability and compliance.

epics.title: Automated Resource Discovery and Data Normalization
epics.summary: Develop continuous resource discovery and normalization across multi-cloud environments
epics.description: Build a discovery subsystem capable of scanning onboarded accounts to identify infrastructure services, configurations, and assets. Normalize diverse resource data into a unified schema with consistent metadata. Support ongoing synchronization, manage discovery intervals based on provider limits, and include real-time updates backed by data integrity validation. Automatically track changes and maintain full resource lifecycle awareness across all providers.

epics.title: Unified Dashboard and Visualization
epics.summary: Provide an interactive dashboard for centralized cloud inventory, cost, security, and compliance insights
epics.description: Develop a dynamic and customizable dashboard that consolidates insights from all connected cloud accounts. Display inventory states, cost breakdowns, compliance overviews, and security posture metrics in real time. Enable dashboards to adapt based on user roles and permissions. Include drill-down navigation, advanced filtering, and visual widgets for actionable operational insights across all clouds from a single interface.

epics.title: Cost Analysis and Optimization Recommendations
epics.summary: Build multi-cloud cost aggregation, analysis, and optimization insights
epics.description: Integrate cost and usage data sources from each cloud provider to build a unified cost data model. Implement analytics to identify inefficiencies such as idle or underutilized resources and provide intelligent recommendations for optimization. Support spend forecasting, budgeting, and anomaly detection across multi-account environments. Enable historical cost comparison and savings visualizations to drive financial efficiency.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Assessment Framework
epics.summary: Implement continuous monitoring of security posture and compliance benchmarks
epics.description: Develop a rule-based evaluation framework to assess configurations and operational states against security and compliance standards such as CIS, NIST, and ISO 27001. Detect compliance drift, misconfigurations, and high-risk settings across cloud environments. Provide detailed insights with rule explanations, severity levels, and remediation guidance. Include integration with external audit and compliance tools to maintain policy consistency.

epics.title: Governance Automation and CI/CD Workflow Integration
epics.summary: Enable automated policy enforcement and integration with DevOps pipelines
epics.description: Create a governance automation engine that triggers rule-based workflows for policy enforcement, environment provisioning, and tagging compliance. Integrate with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab, and Azure DevOps, as well as Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) tools like Terraform and Ansible. Implement change approvals, rollback mechanisms, and audit trails for automated workflows to ensure reliability and accountability.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notifications
epics.summary: Implement a configurable alerting system for cost, security, and compliance events
epics.description: Develop a unified alerting engine that processes cost anomalies, security violations, and compliance breaches in real time. Provide configurable thresholds, event correlation, and severity levels. Deliver notifications via multiple channels, including email, messaging applications, and webhooks. Enable smart alert deduplication and escalation policies to ensure effective and timely incident responses without alert fatigue.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Activity Tracking
epics.summary: Maintain a secure, searchable audit trail of all platform and user activities
epics.description: Implement a complete auditing subsystem that records all user activities, configuration updates, and automated system actions. Capture contextual data, including timestamps, actor identities, and affected entities. Maintain immutability and exportability of logs for investigations or compliance reviews. Provide filters and search capabilities along with retention policies and integration with enterprise logging and SIEM solutions.

epics.title: High Availability, Scalability, and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Ensure the platform performs reliably under heavy multi-tenant workloads
epics.description: Design the system for high availability and elasticity, capable of scaling up and down to meet demand. Use distributed processing, caching, and load balancing to deliver optimal performance across large datasets. Implement observability tools to monitor latency, throughput, and error rates. Ensure fault tolerance with component redundancy, disaster recovery, and self-healing mechanisms for continuous operation.

user_stories.epic_title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Design Secure Authentication System
user_stories.description: As a security architect, I want to design a secure authentication system with enterprise identity providers, so that user sessions adhere to enterprise-grade security standards.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authentication protocols using SAML, OAuth2.0, LDAP; enterprise standards
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Authentication system integrates with at least one identity provider.
2. User sessions are logged and audited.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an identity provider, when a user attempts to authenticate, then the system should log the session and ensure it meets security standards.

user_stories.epic_title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to implement role-based access control, so that user permissions align with their roles within the organization.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles mapping to permissions, RBAC implementation
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Roles are created with appropriate permissions.
2. Users are assigned roles and granted appropriate access.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a defined role, when a user with that role accesses a resource, then the system should ensure the user has the appropriate permissions.
